scripts.stop:synapse:tests: docker container kill $(docker container ls -q --filter name=synapsedocker-*)
scripts.assert-synapse-running: if [ "`docker ps -f name='boxel-synapse' --format '{{.Names}}'`" = 'boxel-synapse' ]; then echo 'synapse is already running'; else pnpm run start:synapse; fi
scripts.test: start-server-and-test 'pnpm run wait' 'http-get://localhost:4201/base/fields/boolean-field?acceptHeader=application%2Fvnd.card%2Bjson|http-get://localhost:4202/test/hassan?acceptHeader=application%2Fvnd.card%2Bjson' 'pnpm run start:host-pre-built' 'http://127.0.0.1:4200' 'pnpm playwright test'
